mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SFM_COMMUNITY (CNUM, CSUBJECT, CNAME, CCONTENT, CFILE, MEMNUM, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{cnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccontent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
